content: It’s important to note that although early the Stansbury Park store has performed better than our initial expectations, giving us additional confidence to take the smaller store concept to carefully considered markets across the U.S. As communicated prior, we are on track to open 10 new stores this year, ending fiscal 2022, with a total of 132 stores in 30 states. Net sales for the first quarter of fiscal 2022 were $309.5 million compared to $327 million in the first quarter of 2021, a decrease of 5.3% over the prior year period, but at the high end of our guidance.
